paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: The application shows how to use the very useful MESSAGE_BOX control.

An event ( EVENT_HANDLER) is associated to a control (here to the BUTTON). So the line ' . ( {}. make (Current, $ ))' associates a click to my_button to the feature on_my_button_clicked. So every time the BUTTON my_button is clicked, the feature on_my_button_clicked is executed.
The feature my_button_clickeddisplays a MESSAGE_BOX ( feature { WINFORMS_MESSAGE_BOX}. show ( msg)) with the text contained in TEXT_FIELD ( msg := my_text_field. text).
